wiki.content: Multi-talented singer/songwriter/producer/musician Bruno Mars is on a roll at the moment, with 'The Lazy Song' giving the Honolulu-born twenty-five year old his third consecutive UK No.1 single from his first three releases. It soared to the top spot in May 2011 following the success of 'Grenade' and 'Just the Way You Are'. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: Multi-talented singer/songwriter/producer/musician Bruno Mars is on a roll at the moment, with 'The Lazy Song' giving the Honolulu-born twenty-five year old his third consecutive UK No.1 single from his first three releases. It soared to the top spot in May 2011 following the success of 'Grenade' and 'Just the Way You Are'.
